channel.title: Oliver Clark's New Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Oliver Clark's New Blog

item.title: Hello_World.Rmd
item.description: In true coding fashion, here’s the obligatory hello world post. I’ve been typing hello world into programming langyages since I was 12 and that’s usually as far as I got with coding until about 2 years ago when I started using PsychoPy. The purpose of this blog is to document my PhD progress to try and encourage me to write. I keep a research notebook but the handwriting is terrible and whenever I read back on it the content is incoherant.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a PhD student at Manchester Metropolitan University applying lessons learned from the reproducability crisis to a project on the Proteus Effect, health and body image.
